name: Winter Sleigh
description:
Do you miss REAL winters with REAL SNOW? Do you want to slide down hills ON A SLEIGH?! Well, who wouldn't! Join the fun in challenging tracks (or make your own) on shiny hills and puffy snowbanks of Winter Sleigh!

Winter Sleigh is a beautiful snow-slide simulation game for those who miss the excitement one usually gets when sliding down snowy hills.

Perhaps you haven't had snow in the recent winters. Perhaps you have already grown up and are too embarrassed to go to the hills on your own. Or perhaps you live in a city (or a desert) where it is somewhat more difficult to engage in this cool attraction no pun intended! If so, Winter Sleigh just might be for you.

Features:
  • Epic levels for you and your sleigh
  • Play as a guy dressed as the Santa Claus
  • Amazing snow experience
  • A built-in level creator for more exciting levels for you to make
  • Reindeers.
Important!
No reindeers were harmed during the creation of this game.
